attributes.action: Artist Soulja Boy, has released a new song that includes the phrase "FUCK THE ARMY TROOPS"
attributes.additional_details:
Artist Soulja Boy, has released a new song that includes the phrase "FUCK THE ARMY TROOPS" he continues on to say how "hard" and "real" he is and how "fake" our (VETS) are. I am going to test the power of social networking and see if this reaches him, but anytime he wants to defend that statement I know a lot of people who would gladly oblige. :) Do me a favor and re-post! Military and civilian!
 SPREAD THE WORD PEOPLE RE-POST!!!........BLACK LIST THIS RECORD LABEL
Deport this person he is not worthy of the lives lost for our freedom.
